alert.note: Alert for Pointe Coupee; West Feliciana (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of West Feliciana, Pointe Coupee Parishes in southeastern Louisiana and Wilkinson Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 345 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Acme to Whiteville. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... New Roads, St. Francisville, Woodville, Morganza, Wakefield, Lettsworth, Spillman, Batchelor, Fort Adams and Dolorosa. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for southeastern Louisiana.
